data.eml:eml: A synopsis of Agnetina (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Weihai, Wang, Guoquan (2012): A synopsis of Agnetina (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3526: 84-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282749
